snippet.title: Woman hit by car outside school
snippet.content: A WOMAN is in a serious condition after being hit by a car outside a school south of Brisbane this morning. Police said initial information indicated the woman was struck on Bardon Road, Berrinba at about 6.15am. The incident occurred across the road from Berrinba East State School. The age of the woman is not yet known. Meanwhile, a man has been seriously injured after his car rolled over on the Burke Developmental Rd about 15km west of Chillagoe in north Queensland just after 5am this morning. Paramedics have requested a helicopter to take the man to hospital after he suffered suspected spinal and internal injuries in the crash. No other vehicles were involved in the incident. Police are investigating.
